name: a Matrix text waterfall-erizer
description:
On hover, replaces links with an image of the letter cascade from 'The Matrix'. Soooo twentieth-century. Oops, I mean soooo futuristic. 

(If futuristic is cruisin' a cesspool in a 19th century bathysphere that's stuffed with 1980s computers and a 1960's dentist's chair trying to evade sea monsters that are straight outta Jules Verne.)
